significant_events_2019.details: Replaced approximately 50 windows facing the courtyard with modern aluminum-framed windows. Initial assessment was 33 windows, but detailed inspection increased to 50. Renovation of old stairwell windows including some with original mouth-blown glass, some of which were completely rotten.
Following maintenance plan - working from roof downward. Roof previously sealed. Window replacement completed. Facade work towards Valhallavägen and Villagatan continuing.

significant_events_after_year_end.details: Both elevators underwent renovation including installation of photocells (now EU safety standard - elevator stops if beam is broken)

Both waste rooms painted. Improved recycling with food waste for biogas. Reduced household waste pickups from current 2/week. Eliminated waste chute and carousel system (ergonomic issues with heavy lifting) replacing with two 370L bins.
Pipe inspection/filming postponed due to infection risk. Basement hallway painting postponed - want to analyze seven pipes first to prioritize future pipe renovation.

Plan to renovate outer courtyards facing Villagatan. Planted trees have taken root. Need drainage installation near walls to prevent basement moisture. Soil depleted and needs improvement for vegetation.
Investigating how to improve internet reception and use pre-installed fiber technology. Researching which fiber provider offers best value.

Improved paper/cardboard packaging sorting with dedicated 370L bin. Reduced newspaper recycling bin from 370L to 190L due to decreased paper newspaper volume. Board encourages members to use 'Källsortera' app from Suez.

board_commentary: Vi fortsätter att underhålla vårt hus ovanifrån och nedåt. Taket har tidigare tätats. Nu har vi bytt ut dåliga fönster mot innergården liksom på taket.
maintenance_philosophy: Maintaining building from top to bottom following long-term maintenance plan 2015-2035

special_notes.description: Neighbor association BRF Valhall 90 receives district heating from this building's (previously jointly owned) heating central. They are invoiced approximately 100,000 kr/year (29% of total heating cost)
